<!-- # 🔬 Research Interests -->

<div class="research-card">
Trustworthy AI, with a focus on **privacy**, **security**, and **robustness** in large language models (LLMs).

<div class="research-highlights">
🛡️ **My work explores:**<br>
- 🔒 Adversarial robustness<br>
- 🔐 Differential privacy<br>
- 💧 Watermarking techniques<br>

to ensure reliable and ethical deployment of LLMs in real-world applications.
</div>
</div>
